com.redhat.rhn.common.db.datasource

Class ModeFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.common.db.datasource.ModeFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ManifestFactoryBuilder

    public class ModeFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ManifestFactoryBuilder
    Class to drive parsing of the DataSource XML files, and return modes as they are requested.
